Text:
ESIR releases are generally among the best in quality.. in this case, a higher quality release was already available

http://thepiratebay.se/torrent/5824980/The.Game.1997.720p.BluRay.x264-MX

As indicated, a good 2010 (U.K.) Blu-Ray rip of this was already available.  Not sure what prompted the upload of this rip from a 2007 HDDVD  

The U.S. Blu-Ray of this is finally being released in September (2012) and should be substantially better quality than the U.K. release from 2010, considering the U.K. Blu-Ray transfer didn't get stellar reviews from Blu-Ray.com.  Awesome movie, looking forward to the new release.
